trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is a container for a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項是一組的容器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An application renders a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the client browser based on criteria that the application defines.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式呈現特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>應用程式定義的準則為基礎的用戶端瀏覽器控制項。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner>類別提供設計階段支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>視覺化設計工具中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner>類別時，它會建立相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates that the <see langword="nowrap" /> HTML attribute should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示不應該使用 <see langword="nowrap" /> HTML 屬性。
